items.title: Immersive Gameplay
items.description: Lose yourself in stunning visuals and captivating storylines

items.title: Multiplayer Adventures
items.description: Team up with friends or challenge rivals in epic battles

items.title: Regular Updates
items.description: Enjoy fresh content and exciting events every month

items.quote: Crystal Realms is a game-changer in the fantasy RPG genre!
Absolutely stunning visuals and engaging gameplay.
The most immersive multiplayer experience I've ever had.

items.question: What platforms is Crystal Realms available on?
items.answer: Crystal Realms is available on PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X/S.

items.question: Is there a subscription fee to play?
items.answer: No, Crystal Realms is free to play. However, there are optional in-game purchases for cosmetic items and convenience features.

items.question: How often do you release new content?
items.answer: We release major content updates every three months, with smaller events and balance patches on a monthly basis.
